resources.string: Work on multimedia programming and mobile devices, application on types of vehicle tires
" Welcome to the Help section. Here you will find answers to frequently asked questions and guides to make your tire buying experience easier and faster."

" How do I find tires for my vehicle?\n Enter the make, model and year of your vehicle in the search engine to obtain compatible tires. You can also search by specific measurements or tire type if you already have that data."

" How do I make a purchase?\n Once the tire is selected, add it to the cart and follow the on-screen steps to complete your purchase. You can pay by credit card, debit card or alternative payment methods."

Can I return or exchange my tires?\n Returns or exchanges are allowed within the first 30 days of purchase. Tires must be unused and in their original packaging. See our returns policy for more details.
" Contact If you need more help or have a specific question, you can contact us: Email: support@llantas.com Telephone: +34 123 456 789 Opening hours: Monday to Friday from 9:00 a.m. to 6:00 p.m."
" What shipping methods do you offer?\n We offer home delivery and you can also choose to pick up your tires at a store near you. Shipping times and costs vary by location."

" Tips for your purchase Check the specifications of your tires carefully before purchasing them to ensure compatibility with your vehicle. Take advantage of the special promotions and discounts that you will find in the Offers section."
